definitions.text: the total output of a writer or artist (or a substantial part of it)

definitions.text: be employed

definitions.text: have an effect or outcome; often the one desired or expected

definitions.text: operate in or through

definitions.text: resulting favorably
examples: it's a good thing that I wasn't there
it is good that you stayed

definitions.text: wise or advantageous and hence advisable
